resources.string: Are you sure you want to leave the game?
You are now in the lobby

New Game: host a new game choosing either Normal or Challenge Mode. Choose a nickname for that particular game. After creating a game you are sent to a lobby where the game code is presented, as well as an overview of the players joining. Press “Start Game” to start the game.

Join Game: join an existing game by typing in the Game Code for that game. Choose a nickname for that particular game. After joining the game you are sent to a lobby where you can see the other players joining. Wait for the host to start the game.

Normal Mode: the system generates questions.

Challenge Mode: before the game starts, the players input two locations, and thus generate questions for the other players.

During a game you are presented with questions. You guess the correct answer by typing in a number, before pressing the “Answer” button. A timer shows how much time you have left to answer.
